explains: n. 泥瓦匠；石工（等于 stonemason）共济会会员（等于 freemason）

sentences.en: Professor Mason, do you have a minute?
"Take a look," says Mason, pulling out a sheet of data.
sentences.cn: “看一下。”梅森一边说，一边拿出一份数据表。

sentences.en: Looking side-on, Mason measures the distance between strokes.
sentences.cn: 梅森通过从侧面观察来测量每次划水之间的距离。
